title: Surrealistic Cinemagraph
description: A looped video showcasing a dream/nightmare fantasy.

title: Long Exposure Photo
description: A photo using the slow shutter priority mode at 30 seconds.

title: Fast Exposure Photo
description: A photo using the fast shutter priority mode.

title: Aperture Progression
description: A series of 3 photos using aperture priority mode at 3 different intervals.

title: Surrealistic Poster
description: A series of images transformed and blended together to form a dream/nightmare fantasy as a poster.

title: Narrative Imagery
description: An image that portrays the empty highways due to COVID-19.

title: Reassigning Textures
description: An image where a wooden texture was reassigned with a white wolf.

title: Cinemagraph
description: A looped video showcasing a waterfall.

title: Controlled Light
description: A series of images that showcase the use of light in natural as well as studio environments.

title: Architectural Imagery
description: An image that features a piece of architecture.

title: mediamalcolm - Lead Generator
description: This video is made to help those who want to make a music video.

title: mediamalcolm - Opener Exercise
description: This video was made to assist the mediamalcolm brand. It is a work in progress and will be re-made in the future.

title: Shooting with a Smartphone Exercise
description: This whole video was shot on a smartphone device.

title: Stabilizer Practice
description: This video was shot using a stabilizer.

title: An Influencer Exercise
description: This was an exercise to practice my on camera performance.

title: Vlog
description: This video was made to help people learn the in's and the out's of Mac OS.

title: Shooting a Montage
description: This is a video made to exercise editing video to the beat of a music track, while using proper shooting techniques to record something in slow motion.

title: A Framing Exercise
description: This video was made to help learn and test framing skills while shooting with a DSLR camera.

title: A Lighting Exercise
description: This video was made to test out using three-point lighting kits. Allowing for a nicely lit interview.

title: An Interview Exercise
description: This video was made to practice framing a shot for an interview.

title: Using a DSLR Camera
description: This was an exercise to test out the funcitons of a DSLR camera.
